channel.title: Can some Clarify this line of code?

item.title: Can some Clarify this line of code?
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

		}
		if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 117 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 112) { // giant
			rand_npc = misc.random(10);

what exactly is the misc random (10) and 117 or 112 is the npc id? or what explain it please thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Can some Clarify this line of code?
